US will not deport young illegal immigrants

The Obama administration will grant work permits to young illegal immigrants who came to the US as children and have led law-abiding lives. (Globe, 11:17 a.m.)

SJC: Women who give birth unassisted won't face criminal liability if baby dies

The court threw out the involuntary manslaughter conviction of a Milford woman whose child died during a birth without medical assistance. (Globe, 10:45 a.m.)

Prosecutor fears Waltham police chief facing criminal assault charges is suicidal

Thomas M. LaCroix is in Emerson Hospital today amid concerns that he may be suicidal following his arrest in his home Thursday, prosecutors said. (Globe, 12:09 p.m.)
